bcid
Class CheckDigit

java.lang.Object
  bcid.CheckDigit

public class CheckDigit
extends java.lang.Object

The Check Digit algorithm is adapted from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luhn_mod_N_algorithm

This Class assumes use of Base64 encoding values
